pageContext.claim: “But in California, the governor sent, I hear -- or is sending -- millions of ballots all over the state. Millions. To anybody. To anybody. People that aren't citizens, illegals. Anybody that walks in California is going to get a ballot.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is wrong. The governor of California authorized the mailing of ballots to registered voters, not to everyone in the state and not to non-citizens.
